title: Education Utilizing Infographics to Improve Visual Literacy

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented training using personal devices to enhance workplace document visualization skills for employees.

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain core components of infographics (layout, color, typography) with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can analyze given text and create a draft infographic on job-related topics within three hours.
Learners can evaluate the visual logic and information delivery effectiveness of peer-produced infographics using a four-level rubric.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
